Title: FoxCommerce
Description:
FoxCommerce is open source e-commerce solution. It's developed in 
- Asp.NET MVC3 and Razor View Engine
- Visual C#.NET
- jquery 1.5.1
- jquery-ui 1.8.11
- knockout MVVM Javascript Library
- jquerymobile
HomeWiki:
FoxCommerce is open source e-commerce solution. Using following technologies,
  • Asp.NET MVC4
  • C#
  • jquery
  • Backbone.js
  • _underscore.js
  • jquerymobile
  • SignalR
  • Redis
  • ServiceStack
  • Autofac

Many useful tool during the research phase

Development which were suspended due to the density will start again..
